actions.text: On agreeing to the Quigley amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 239 (Roll no. 384).

description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for the National Nuclear Security Administration, Weapons Activities account (specifically the Long Range Standoff Cruise Missile Warhead Study) by $7.6 million and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for the National Nuclear Security Administration, Weapons Activities account (specifically the Long Range Standoff Cruise Missile Warhead Study) by $7.6 million and apply the savingsto the spending reduction account.
